name: Duck Hunt (MetaphysicsStudios)
description:
Welcome to Duck Hunt!

I decided to complete a game quickly the night before I go on vacation because I was bored. I completed this in probably 8 hours. It's not much and I may update it before the jam is over if I get a chance. I hope you enjoy a simple duck-hunting game! How many ducks can you hunt in ONE minute?

SPECIAL NOTE: The levels are randomly-generated, so ponds will appear differently each time you play. (There's no mechanical differences to the ponds. It's all aesthetic.)

Objectives

Shoot as many ducks as you can in ONE minute. Shoot ducks to get kills. Shoot crates to pick up one of three "boosts" - $5 extra money, 5 extra ammo, or 5 extra seconds of time.

Controls

Left Click - shoot gun / use buttons

Mouse - move gun/cursor

WASD - move camera around level
